extendedInfo.description: â Online Multiplayer, Survival, Missions, Sandbox, Custom Equipment, Perks, Achievements, Leaderboards. Does your sniper game have all this? Online Sniper League does. Time to step it up - download now.â Over 800,000 iPhone users can't be wrong.  See why they love Online Sniper League!âââââ "Recommended and must own" - iPhoneGamerUK4/4 Stars "a must for any 1st person shooter enthusiasts" - IViewApps.com"a competitive-top of the food chain game" - The App Shack"an awesome game to play" - AppAdvice.comâ The most complete sniper game - with both online and offline play, as well as freestyle Sandbox Mode.â The most unique sniper game on the android market or anywhere.  This isn't a game where you sit there waiting for some guy to walk around a corner to shoot him. This is an action sniper game where you have to act quickly and shoot accurately.â Several Game ModesOnline Multiplayer - Play online against a friend or using auto-match. Launch foot agents, paratroopers, armored vehicles, helicopters, attacks and more from your Wrist Computer real-time to defeat your opponent before they get you. Use perks and your customized weapons to gain the upper hand. Only one will survive the battle. See how you compare on the Leaderboards.Survival - Defend your base against never ending waves of enemies for as many days as you can. Go for kill streaks to unlock extra defense mechanisms. Compare how many days you can last against others on the Leaderboards. Unlock Achievements to prove your skills.Missions - Fulfill contracts from your boss to earn prestige as well as some extra Gold. Each mission requires skill and strategy. New missions will be released periodically, so pay attention to updates and the news feed.Sandbox - Freestyle version of Multiplayer where you can train for matches or play for fun. Test out your weapons and perk combinations to find the best strategy to defeat your opponents. Hone your sniping skills and your attack skills. Or just dial up some enemies and take them out for fun!â CustomizationsPerks - Unlock 24 perks and 3 slots to equip them. This gives you over 2000 combinations. Find the ones that work well together to gain the upper hand on your opponent. Use offensive and defensive perks to win the match.Weapons - Unlock and equip custom weapons to create the ultimate loadout. Upgrade your rifle, scope, ammo and more. Custom weapons can be used in all game modes.â Much MoreUnlock the Machine Gun to mow down enemies with easeEnlist body guards to protect your base and defeat enemy Agents in hand to hand combatUnlock the mighty Nuclear Bomb to unleash an attack that leaves no survivorsGet bonuses for Kill StreaksLeaderboards and Achievements to track your progress and show your skills offOh, and you can Rick Roll your opponent in Multiplayer :)If you made it this far, you are an elite person and this game is for you. See you on the Leadeboards.

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: I have an HTC REZOUND with ice cream sandwhich and its force closes... Not really force closing but just exiting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Home screen return app?
reviews.comment: If this app is meant to return me to my home screen every time I tap this icon, then this app does it so well. But a game? I saw no such thing. Don\'t bother with this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: aww:(
reviews.comment: I used to love this game on my ipod... now I got my xperia play... and it wont open :\'( please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PLEASE FIX
reviews.comment: I hit open when the app finished installing and the game closes and goes back to my home screen please fix so I could play with my friends
reviews.author: Chris Iaderosa

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: I recommend this game because its one of few action games that is what I\'ve been looking for :P !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bacon
reviews.comment: Good game but can\'t play online and I get kicked out of game if I use my machine gun in survival mode
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: It likes to bring you to your hompage a lot. Also while playing the screen somtimes will suddenly jolt away from where I had it.

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.comment: It forces close never got to play the game don\'t bother if or thinking about it
reviews.author: Cody Smith

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: right when I\'m in the middle of a 4 to  5 day survival game I get rick rolled and then the game force closes....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was fun
reviews.comment: Open played worked great then closed for a few minutes came back and won\'t load just exits after first screen ALSO MUSIC SUCKS NO WAY TO DISABLE but then I only played once so if there is a way it\'s not obvious

reviews.comment: I want it fixt stupids it force closes if your reding this dont get it\tIt suckes
reviews.author: Jane Cole

reviews.title: Poor performance
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing every single time I press play I use to play this before and it don\'t crash...and I liked it!! Until this gets fixed...1 star!!!
reviews.author: Wesly Matthews

reviews.title: It was fun...I even spent $!
reviews.comment: I was playing and playing..hooked is what i was, i won a machine gun in surv mode! Used it to knock my enemies over like a domino effect! BUT THEN...IT HAPPENED! ..yea..the game stopped working and wont start again...so gay... :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not that fun
reviews.comment: Its not that fun for android users it will work then it will quit working!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I opened,played,and beat the missions but it says conecting for 3hours when online play is attempted. Awesome game, want to play online, but can\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Umm. What?
reviews.comment: So, this app shows you a barcode logo and then....closes? If that\'s the point of this app, congrats. You win. It works fabulously. If it\'s actually supposed to be a game that works, it fails so much that I think it even fails to fail. Which seems oxymoronic. Which makes my head hurt. Which makes me angry. Which makes me give low ratings. If I could give 0 stars, I would.
reviews.author: Nicholas Kaelber

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: I\'ve been following this game for a while and always get my hopes up hoping this game is actually PLAYABLE it looks and sounds very good but cmon guys get your act together I wanna play the great looking game so please fix the crash bug for eveverybody not just patch It and label it fixed tear it down and do it right thx :(
reviews.author: Kasey Czeiner

reviews.title: Long but good
reviews.comment: Takes a long time to load and install but after that it is a great game.
reviews.author: Noah Curland

reviews.title: Why won\'t it open??
reviews.comment: It looked like fun, but it closes out as soon as you open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is a gun awesome game that words can noteven explain
